name: Eris Ekanem
description: Ekanem is a writer and storyboard artist. She's learning French and training her cat with sign language.
mobileDescription: Ekanem is a writer and storyboard artist.
She's learning French and training her cat with sign language.

name: Nneoma Kenure
description: Nneoma is a culture critic and a feminist writer exploring how culture influences the stories we tell. She's currently editing her debut memoir.
mobileDescription: Nneoma is a culture critic and a feminist writer exploring how culture influences the stories we tell.
She's currently editing her debut memoir.

name: Opemipo Aikomo
description: Ope started wuruwuru and directs the team. In his spare time, he leads the design team at Paystack.
mobileDescription: Ope started wuruwuru and directs the team.
In his spare time, he leads the design team at Paystack.

name: Tomiwa Ajiboye
description: Tomiwa is a product designer and music buff. He's building Comicrunes, a platform for reading comics. He enjoys taking it slow or driving really fast. No in-betweens.
mobileDescription: Tomiwa is a product designer and music buff.
He's building Comicrunes, a platform for bringing comics to readers.
He enjoys taking it slow or driving really fast. No in-betweens.

name: Williams Ogah
description: Williams previously worked as a project manager and is curious about how creative ideas come to life. When he's not taking naps, he also runs a consulting business.
mobileDescription: Williams previously worked as a project manager and is curious about how creative ideas come to life.
